UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile within the InvoiceAI Pro application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

firstName.description: The first name of the user.

lastName.description: The last name of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

companyName.description: The name of the company the user is associated with.

role.description: The role of the user within the application (e.g., admin, contractor).

Estimate.title: Estimate
Estimate.description: Represents an estimate created within the InvoiceAI Pro application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Estimate entity.

estimateNumber.description: The user-facing sequential number for the estimate (e.g., EST-001).

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this estimate.

clientName.description: The name of the client receiving the estimate.

description.description: A detailed description of the estimate.

dateCreated.description: The date the estimate was created.

status.description: The current status of the estimate (e.g., draft, sent, approved, rejected).

Invoice.title: Invoice
Invoice.description: Represents an invoice generated from an estimate within the InvoiceAI Pro application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Invoice entity.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this invoice.

clientName.description: The name of the client being invoiced.

description.description: A detailed description of the invoice.

amount.description: The total amount due on the invoice.

dateCreated.description: The date the invoice was created.

dueDate.description: The date the invoice is due.

status.description: The current status of the invoice (e.g., sent, paid, overdue).

Client.title: Client
Client.description: Represents a client of a user.

definition.description: Stores clients created by a specific user.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

params.name: clientId
params.description: The unique identifier for the client.

definition.description: Root collection for all estimates. Security rules enforce user ownership.

params.name: estimateId
params.description: The unique identifier for the estimate.

definition.description: Root collection for all invoices. Security rules enforce user ownership.

params.name: invoiceId
params.description: The unique identifier for the invoice.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore data structure is designed for a multi-user application with public document sharing. Estimates and invoices are in root collections to allow for public, unauthenticated reads via a direct link. Each document contains a 'userId' field to enforce ownership for write operations and private list queries. Clients are stored in a sub-collection under each user, as they are private to that user. This approach balances public accessibility with secure, user-specific data ownership.
